| HistoryText             = The '''Seven Gods of Zangabal''' were the pantheon worshiped in the city of [[Zangabal]], and were commonly invoked, both by [[Zangabali]]{{r|Creatures on the Loose #23}} and foreigners.{{r|Creatures on the Loose #23}}{{r|Creatures on the Loose #24}}{{r|Creatures on the Loose #26}}

[[Kaman Thuu (Earth-616)|Kaman Thuu]] posed as a priest of the Seven Gods of Zangabal{{r|Creatures on the Loose #23}} in order to enlist Thongor in the robbery of a [[Mirror of Zaffar|mirror of black glass]] from the [[House of Athmar Phong|house]] of the sorcerer [[Athmar Phong (Earth-616)|Athmar Phong]].{{r|Creatures on the Loose #22}}
